metadata.name: Yet Another Voodoo Pin over Dull Razor
metadata.directory: yet another voodoo pin over dull razor
metadata.description:
Replaces Dull Razor with Antibirth's Voodoo Pin! The item still works the same, its just the name and sprite that have changed.
Why should you use this over other Voodoo Pin mods? - Actually changed death icon and achievement sprite! - Full EID and Encyclopedia support! - Overall a less buggy implementation!
